department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

remark.ch: 研究所領域分類:化工類、材料類

goal.en: The objective of this course is to provide the students highly sought-after soft skills, in the context of effective communication, writing and interview. Students will learn how to document, present, and market oneself through spoken and written communication skills.
goal.ch: 本課程的目標在提供學生有效的溝通技巧、寫作和面試等高需求軟實力。學生將學習如何通過口語表達和書面溝通技巧來記錄、清晰闡述他們的研究，和在工作上的自我行銷。

content.en:
‧Academic writing - an introduction
‧Structure of a reserch thesis
‧Guildlines for reserch thesis technical content
‧Guidelines for research thesis preparation
‧Reserch paper preparation
‧ Oral and visual communication
‧How to survive your viva voce
‧ Conference-style presentation techniques
‧ Non-verbal communication skills
‧ Cover letter preparation and curriculum vitae and resume preparation
‧ Job interview skills
content.ch:
‧學術寫作 - 簡介
‧研究論文之結構
‧研究論文技術內容指南
‧研究論文準備指南
‧學術期刊論文準備
‧ 口頭報告和視覺傳?
‧如何通過你的論文口試
‧ 學術會議報告技巧
‧ 非語言及肢體溝通技巧
‧求職信、簡歷和簡歷編製
‧ 面試技巧

grading.en: 2 assignments 40% (20% each) Oral presentation (including visual presentations) 30% Simple research report 30%
grading.ch: 作業練習（２份） 40% (每份20%) 口頭報告（含簡報設計及使用) 30% 簡單研究報告 30%
